title: Endless Legend
notes: Starts up fine but fails to start first new game. Much like this issue: https://steamcommunity.com/app/289130/discussions/0/619574421376583498/ ... Adding the launch option of -useembedded fixes it (or maybe a restart did?)

title: Endless Legend
notes: Need to use the launch option "-useembedded" (without quotes), otherwise it fails to start a new game
